c1.name: Invincible Stonewall
c1.descriptionRaw: Party members within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
c1.description: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

c2.name: Rockcore Meltdown
c2.descriptionRaw: When the meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
c2.description: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

c3.name: Will of the Rock
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Reaction Force
c4.descriptionRaw:
The shockwave triggered by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.
c4.description:
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c5.name: Meteorite Impact
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Everlasting Boulder
c6.descriptionRaw:
The barrier created by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> lasts 10s longer.
c6.description:
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
